meaningMnemonic: The <radical>original</radical> <radical>tsunami</radical> was the <kanji>origin</kanji> of Japan. A big tsunami came and uncovered the islands of Japan. It's the origin of all life, as far as Japanese people are concerned.
readingMnemonic: This tsunami was also the <kanji>origin</kanji> of <reading>Gen</reading>ji (げん), from "The Tale of Genji." Just think, without this origin, Japan wouldn't exist and neither would the first Japanese heartthrob, Genji!
